title: What Are We Waiting For? (2R15)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Dwarven
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Fellowship: Exert a Dwarf to make an opponent draw 2 cards. That player then chooses to either discard 2 Shadow cards from hand or skip his or her next Shadow phase.
Lore:	”'It is not despair, for despair is only for those who see the end beyond all doubt.'”
Rarity:	R
Notes:	If a second copy of this card is played and that Shadow player has already chosen to skip his or her next Shadow phase, that player may choose to skip the same Shadow phase again (which has no effect).
